description:
The soft and heavy 4-way stretch polyester blend used ensures a comfortable and quiet experience during hunting expeditions. The fabric minimizes noise generated by movements, allowing you to remain stealthy and undisturbed in the wilderness. They also feature a gusseted crotch design to allow greater freedom of movement and eliminates any restrictions, enabling you to navigate challenging terrains with ease and comfort.

With six practical pockets, these pants offer ample storage space for your hunting essentials and to be able to access your gear and accessories easily. Stay organized and prepared for every hunting situation.
name: Hooke Adventure Cargo Pants - Mens
